dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle financial uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold risks to maximize returns, even if it means facing potential losses.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and security over potential gains, avoiding high-risk investments.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle stress or anxiety?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly express their emotions, seeking support from others when needed.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, only sharing them with trusted individuals or through subtle cues.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach social gatherings?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be the life of the party, seeking out new people and experiences to engage with.
Your FarTwin will prefer smaller, more low-key gatherings, taking time to recharge between social events.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make major decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on logic and data to inform their choices, weighing pros and cons before making a decision.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and listen to their gut feelings when making important decisions.

dimensions.label: Confidence Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle self-doubt or uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will maintain a strong sense of confidence, even in the face of adversity.
Your FarTwin will struggle with self-doubt and uncertainty, seeking reassurance from others or themselves before making decisions.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new skills or knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer to learn through practical experience, experimenting with new techniques and methods.
Your FarTwin will focus on understanding the underlying principles and concepts before applying them in practice.

dimensions.label: Competitive Drive
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach challenges or competitions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will push themselves to excel, often going above and beyond what's expected of them.
Your FarTwin will approach challenges with a laid-back attitude, focusing on having fun rather than striving for perfection.

dimensions.label: Adaptability
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle change or unexpected events?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be able to adapt quickly, adjusting their plans and approach as needed.
Your FarTwin will struggle with change, preferring routine and familiarity over unexpected twists and turns.
